department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Construction of a welcome centre in the Snootli Creek Hatchery
description: This project includes the construction of a welcome centre approximately 93m2 in area, with a simple gable roofline. The building is primarily one large, open room with a small janitor closet and public washroom. The building is located along the highway at the south end of the hatchery, and will be the future home of educational and interpretive material around the salmon and the local First Nation. Completion of the Work: no later than 2023 March 31.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Project Title: Snootli Creek Hatchery Welcome Centre
#### Solicitation Number: WS3745029987

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites bids for the construction of the Snootli Creek Hatchery Welcome Centre.

### Project Details

* Project Location: Snootli Creek Hatchery, [Region]
* Project Size: Approximately 93m2 in area
* Project Description: The construction of a welcome centre with a simple gable roofline, consisting of one large, open room, a small janitor closet, and public washroom.
* Completion Date: No later than March 31, 2023

### Tender Information

* Tender Close Date: November 28, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6
* Contact Person: Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC), summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Further Information

* Tender Description: [Click here to view the tender description](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14605519?extsite=MTQ2MDU1MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Frequently Asked Questions: Available by request to the contracting entity

The submitted tender must meet the specified requirements and be submitted electronically through the [Government of Canada Tendering Website](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-opportunities). Bid submissions will be accepted until the tender close date. Late submissions will not be accepted.  Please note that all bids must be submitted in English or French. 

Please be sure to verify the information on the Government of Canada Tendering Website.  

The PSPC reserves the right to modify the tender details at any time. All changes will be posted on the Government of Canada Tendering Website.  The
